altered_phrase: Luke, I am your developer.
original_phrase: Luke, I am your father.
source: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

altered_phrase: There's no place like localhost.
original_phrase: There's no place like home.

altered_phrase: May the source code be with you.
original_phrase: May the Force be with you.
source: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

altered_phrase: You can't handle the code!
original_phrase: You can't handle the truth!

altered_phrase: To iterate is human; to recurse, divine.
original_phrase: To err is human; to forgive, divine.

altered_phrase: One algorithm to rule them all.
original_phrase: One ring to rule them all.
source: J.R.R. Tolkien ('The Lord of the Rings')

altered_phrase: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a code.
original_phrase: It is a truth universally acknowledged, that a single man in possession of a good fortune, must be in want of a wife.

altered_phrase: To be or not to be: that is the query.
original_phrase: To be or not to be: that is the question.

altered_phrase: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy because of a bug.
original_phrase: All happy families are alike; each unhappy family is unhappy in its own way.

altered_phrase: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains of code.
original_phrase: Man is born free, and everywhere he is in chains.

altered_phrase: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy debugger.
original_phrase: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog.

altered_phrase: O software, software! Wherefore art thou software?
original_phrase: O Romeo, Romeo! Wherefore art thou Romeo?

altered_phrase: In the beginning was the Code, and the Code was with God, and the Code was God.
original_phrase: In the beginning was the Word, and the Word was with God, and the Word was God.

altered_phrase: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go with a team of developers.
original_phrase: If you want to go fast, go alone. If you want to go far, go with others.

altered_phrase: A coding journey of a thousand miles begins with a single line.
original_phrase: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

altered_phrase: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself... and buggy code.
original_phrase: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.

altered_phrase: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universeâ€™s source code.
original_phrase: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.

altered_phrase: Not all those who wander are lost in the code.
original_phrase: Not all those who wander are lost.
source: J.R.R. Tolkien ('The Fellowship of the Ring')

altered_phrase: The course of true love never did run smooth, especially with bad code.
original_phrase: The course of true love never did run smooth.

altered_phrase: Where there is love, there is code.
original_phrase: Where there is love, there is life.

altered_phrase: To code or not to code, that is the question.
original_phrase: To be or not to be, that is the question.

altered_phrase: Liberty, equality, code!
original_phrase: Liberty, equality, fraternity!

altered_phrase: Life is what happens to you while youâ€™re busy making other algorithms.
original_phrase: Life is what happens to you while youâ€™re busy making other plans.

altered_phrase: The unexamined life is not worth coding for.
original_phrase: The unexamined life is not worth living.

altered_phrase: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our compilers.
original_phrase: In the end, we will remember not the words of our enemies, but the silence of our friends.
